Author: connectjob
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 🌎 ConnectJob - Decentralizing the Gig Economy 🌎
Body: ConnectJob ICO  Using blockchain assets, ConnectJob will allow its users to exchange value directly without relying on a third party, and ConnectJob’s team will develop a wide range of services around those assets.  One of ConnectJob’s main strengths lies in the use of the Blockchain technology which allows:                              Secured and independent transactions executed between users without trusting a third party Provide an unlimited number of transactions at a competitive rate (transaction fees) and at a high speed Offer a decentralized service: no regulatory authority for transactions and the ability for other Blockchain applications to interact with ConnectJob’s platform Utility Token usage: benefit from additional functionalities (discount on service provisions, VIP services, etc…) Offers self-sovereign identity service Transfer Jobbers’ reputation in a decentralized manner from ConnectJob’s platform onto other decentralized applications, by developing an API and SDK for a decentralized reputation validation Integrate with the decentralized applications currently being built on the Ethereum blockchain (e.g. uPort for identity management, KyberNetwork for decentralized exchange of tokens, etc.) Progressively shift from a centralized architecture to a decentralized network built on Ethereum Network and the Web3                                              The distribution of CJT tokens [CJT] in the genesis block will be determined by a smart contract hosted on Ethereum.  CJT tokens will be managed by accounts which will have an address and balance, implemented alongside a naming system which will support human-friendly names mapped to a ConnectJob address.
